machines.name: Still
machines.description: A distillation system used to make liquor.

machines.name: Hardwood Keg
machines.description: A versatile keg made of hardwood. Can be used to make malted beverages and fermented milk products.

machines.name: Glass Jar
machines.description: A jar to ferment non-alcoholic beverages. Turns mushrooms and various teas into kombucha.

machines.name: Foreign Cask
machines.description: This cask is of a foreign make. It can ferment soybeans.

machines.name: Butter Churn
machines.description: Turns milk or nuts into butter.

machines.name: Dehydrator
machines.description: Put fruit in here to dry them for later.

machines.name: Drying Rack
machines.description: Put flowers, herbs, or vegetables in here to dry them for later.

machines.name: Enhanced Oil Maker
machines.description: An versatile oil maker that makes specialized oils.

machines.name: Extruder
machines.description: Turns flour into noodles and honey into wax!

machines.name: Grinder
machines.description: Use it to polish rice or grind produce into valuable goods and spices.

machines.name: Infuser
machines.description: A chemical apparatus used to infuse flavors into vodka, making liqueurs and schnapps.

machines.name: Spinning Wheel
machines.description: A small spinning wheel that turns fiber into twine or cotton into thread.

machines.name: Yogurt Jar
machines.description: A jar to allow milk to ferment into yogurt.

machines.name: Wax Barrel
machines.description: A barrel for dipping candles.

machines.name: Ice Cream Machine
machines.description: A machine for making delicious ice cream at home.

machines.name: Alembic
machines.description: Distills flowers, fruits, herbs, and vegetables into essential oils.

machines.name: Vinegar Cask
machines.description: A cask designed to turn grapes into vinegar.

machines.name: Juicer
machines.description: Turns fruit into freshly squeezed juice.

machines.name: Soap Press
machines.description: A press designed for molding soap.

machines.name: Mayonnaise Machine
machines.description: A machine used for producing...exotic mayonnaise.

machines.name: Smoker
machines.description: A smoker used to smoke fish and cheese.
